title: Fighters of Fortune looking for members [OCE SERVER]

replies.body: Still open looking for players, club highest - lowest is Diamond II - SILVER II.

Hey, I'm interested in joining. Although Im still low but I have been learning a lot.
I'm level 11 and my main is Akali, I usually take the top lane when I use Akali.

I'd be interested! I couldn't get higher than S2 this season, but I'm looking to get to gold at least next season (well, between more uni classes and prac). 

I'm usually a support main, but I'm still trying to get better at other roles!

Hey there could be up my ally!

Currently G5 but do play all types of games and will be focusing hard on S8 pushing
for high plat/low diamond.

IGN - Dr Clarence
I'll give it a go. My IGN is Sonatics77, am lvl 30, doing placements before season ends :P. Am a Mid/Top/Jg main (Play Yas, Talon Primarily), but can play anywhere.
I am also interested. My IGN is asianbaconman, i am level 30 and i can play any role preferably not support. Thanks!
I am interested. IGN is Krafty and I am level 28, I mean adc & jungle but can play almost any other role.
